Name: BATTERY CHECK (T-50)
checklistText:
BATTERY CHECK
Approx. T-50 minutes

1. Battery 1 - 4 to OFF
2. Battery 1 to TEST
3. Voltmeter selector to Battery 1
4. Verify volts > 24v.
5. Battery 1 to OFF
6. Battery 2 to TEST
7. Voltmeter selector to Battery 2
8. Verify volts > 24v.
9. Battery 2 to OFF
10. Battery 3 to TEST
11. Voltmeter selector to Battery 3
12. Verify volts > 24v.
13. Battery 3 to OFF
14. Battery 4 to TEST
15. Voltmeter selector to Battery 4
16. Verify volts > 24v.
17. Battery 4 to OFF
